item.text: “For the kingdom of heaven is like a landowner who went out early in the morning to hire workers for his vineyard.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> after <st data-num="4856" class="">agreeing</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2040" class="">workers</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="1220">standard wage</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st>.

When it was <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5154" class="">nine</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">o’clock</st> in the morning,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1831">went out</st> again and <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="2476">standing around</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="58" class="">marketplace</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="692">without work</st>.

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="1565">them</st>, ‘<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3739">whatever</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">right.’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="565" class="">went</st>. When<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1831">went out</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1623" class="">noon</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1766" class="">three</st> <st data-num="5610">o’clock</st> that afternoon,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> the <st data-num="5615">same thing</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1734">five o’clock that afternoon</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1831">went out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">around</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, ‘<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="692">without work</st>?’

They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="3754">Because</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="3409" class="">hired</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us.’</st> He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, ‘<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> and work <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st>.’

When<n id="1" /> it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3798" class="">evening</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">owner</st> of the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2012" class="">manager</st>, ‘<st data-num="2564" class="">Call</st> the <st data-num="2040" class="">workers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="591" class="">pay</st> them their <st data-num="3408" class="">wages</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="757">starting</st> <st data-num="575" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> hired <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first.’</st>

When those hired <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1734" class="">five</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">o’clock</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st>, <st data-num="303" class="">each</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> a <st data-num="1220">full day’s pay</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> when those hired <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st>, they <st data-num="3543" class="">thought</st> they would <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="4119" class="">more</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="303">each one</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> the <st data-num="1220">standard wage</st>.

When<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> it, they began to <st data-num="1111" class="">complain</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="3617" class="">landowner</st>,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> fellows <st data-num="4160" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you have <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2470" class="">equal</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> who <st data-num="941" class="">bore</st> the <st data-num="922" class="">hardship</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2742">burning heat</st> of the <st data-num="2250" class="">day.’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> the landowner<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st> to <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘<st data-num="2083" class="">Friend</st>, I <st data-num="91" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="91" class="">treating</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="91" class="">unfairly</st>. <st data-num="3780">Didn’t</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4856">agree with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to work for the <st data-num="1220">standard wage</st>?<n id="3" />

<st data-num="142" class="">Take</st> what is <st data-num="4674" class="">yours</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st>. I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2078" class="">last man</st><n id="2" /> the same <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> I gave to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

Am <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1832" class="">permitted</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> what <st data-num="1722">belongs</st> to <st data-num="1699">me</st>? <st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3788 4190">envious</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="18" class="">generous?’</st><n id="2" />
So the last will be first, and the first last.”
As Jesus was going up to Jerusalem, he took the 12 aside privately and said to them on the way,

“<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, we are <st data-num="305">going up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2414">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will be <st data-num="3860">handed over</st> to the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st>.<n id="1" /> They will <st data-num="2632" class="">condemn</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>,
and will turn him over to the Gentiles to be mocked and flogged severely and crucified. Yet on the third day, he will be raised.”
Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee came to him with her sons, and kneeling down she asked him for a favor.

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> do you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>?” She <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3004" class="">Permit</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">mine</st> to <st data-num="2523" class="">sit</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2176" class="">left</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “You <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you are <st data-num="154" class="">asking</st>!<n id="2" /> Are you <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>?”<n id="3" /> They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “We are <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st>.”<n id="4" />
He told them, “You will drink my cup, but to sit at my right and at my left is not mine to give. Rather, it is for those for whom it has been prepared by my Father.”
Now when the other 10 heard this, they were angry with the two brothers.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4341" class="">called</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “You <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="758" class="">rulers</st> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="2634" class="">lord it over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those in <st data-num="3173">high positions</st> <st data-num="2715">use their authority</st> <st data-num="2634" class="">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

It must <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3779">this way</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>! <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="1096">be</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> must <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> must <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="1" />—
just as the Son of Man did not come to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.”
As they were leaving Jericho, a large crowd followed them.

<st data-num="1417" class="">Two</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind men</st> were <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="3844">by</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>. When they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="3855">passing by</st>, they <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1653">Have mercy</st><n id="3" /> on <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>!”<n id="4" />

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">scolded</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2443">to get</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to be <st data-num="4623" class="">quiet</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted</st> <st data-num="3173">even more</st> loudly, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1653">have mercy</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>!”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stopped</st>, <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> me to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?”

They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">let</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> be <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>.”
Moved with compassion, Jesus touched their eyes. Immediately they received their sight and followed him.
